comment: Waking up to see and makes you realize just exactly who Bernie Sanders , his campaign staff and supporters are . They will try to win at any cost - and smearing women is what they do best .

comment: This Fight is Entertaining . There is Plenty of Evidence that Sanders is Sexist , nothing New . I bet he Did tell Warren that a Woman couldnt Win . He Implied that countless times while Running against . And BOTH Think a POC cant Win , too .
